channel.title: Weird? error wilst trying to load my client
channel.description:
Ok first off i have put my server into a Excalibur jar file and when i try running it i get this error : [code] Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:104) at client.method6(client.java:6834) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4264) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
and it freezes on Unpacking media
R3P+++ if someone helps me!! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 12:10:05 PM[/size][hr]urghhhh??? no one...

item.title: Weird? error wilst trying to load my client
item.dc:creator: @java_jamie java jamie
item.description:
@java_jamie wrote:

Ok first off i have put my server into a Excalibur jar file and when i try running it i get this error :

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:104) at client.method6(client.java:6834) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4264) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

and it freezes on Unpacking media

R3P+++ if someone helps me!!
